title: Retrieve Available Topics List
description: A request initiated by the Client to list of all available topics.

title: Retrieve Available Topic by an Identifier
description: A request initiated by the Client retrieve details for selected available topic

title: Subscribe To a Topic
description: A request initiated by the Client to create a new subscription for the topic of interest.

title: Unsubscribe From a Topic
description: A request initiated by the Client to remove subscription to the topic of interest.

title: Retrieve Topic Subscriptions List
description: A request initiated by the Client to list of all existing subscriptions to the topics.

title: Retrieve Topic Subscription By an Identifier
description: A request initiated by the Client retrieve details for selected subscription
